apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays two men sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature warm, realistic lighting and smooth gradients. The darker skin tone of one man and the medium-light skin tone of the other are depicted with subtle shading and soft, rounded edges, conveying affection and a romantic connection. This emoji beautifully represents same-sex relationships and expressions of love between men, adding a diverse and inclusive touch to digital conversations on Apple devices.
